item.title: Beatport Pro Music Store
item.description: Beatport's Pro app for the Mac offers a shopping experience that's tailored for the way DJs shop for music. The app lets users analyze their music (tracks, sounds, and playlists) to prepare sets and add music to their playlists. Here are some of the elements of the version 2 interface related to shopping in the app. Beatport comes close to the experience of shopping in a record store, breaking down music into genres and sub-genres.

item.title: Netflix Rate for Recommendations
item.description: Netflix shows a module to signed in users at the top of their home page asking the user to rate recent returns. The module promises to give 2 recommendations immediately after they've rated. On sites like Flickr, the recommendation engine is perhaps one of the single best incentives for adding ratings. On a lot of sites, ratings give you nothing back. This is a good example to illustrate quickly why you'd want to add a rating, and would be particularly useful to demonstrate the value to new users.
